__prompts__.project_name: Project name (used in README.md and headers)
__prompts__.project_name_short: Short project name (used as repo name, log filenames and project directory). No spaces allowed.
__prompts__.module_name: Name of the module, lowercase, using underscores
__prompts__.class_name: Name of the base class in CamelCase
__prompts__.use_config_file: Require user to create and use a config file?
__prompts__.create_env_template: Create a template for .env file loading?
